The Middle Ages left a number of towers, Santa Prassede and Santo Stefano Rotondo. At night, natives and tourists alike flock to its many pubs and restaurants, but much of the original character of Trastevere remains. description:
The mysterious lighthouse is located on the islet of the same name, only 300 m from the west coast of the island of Murter. Its authenticity is proven by the fact that it was built in 1896, and underwent a complete renovation in 2021. It was built to light the way for hardworking sailors and fishermen who find it difficult to navigate at night while entering the Murter archipelago. It bears the title of one of the most beautiful islands, and is only 6 nautical miles from the Kornati National Park. Easy and simple access to the lighthouse is possible, both for adults and children, thanks to the stairs in the harbor. The sea that surrounds it is shallow and warms up quickly during the summer, so swimming will be pleasant and refreshing even after the month of September.

The Luxury Croatia lighthouse is built in a rustic style and is only 5 m away from the Adriatic Sea. It also offers accommodation for a maximum of 8 and optimally 6 people. It is accessible and equipped for older and younger populations who want complete relaxation in a historically modern combination that describes this beautiful location where the lighthouse is located. The lighthouse, on the ground floor, has 3 bedrooms with double beds and 3 en suite bathrooms with showers. If there is a need for an extra bed, you can also use the sofa bed. On the ground floor there is a beautifully decorated kitchen, which is followed by a dining room with a table for 6 people. On the upper floor you will be greeted by a nice living room with a sofa, two armchairs, a table and a TV.

What will surely delight those who like to try new traditional wines, in this case, Dalmatian, is the unique wine stone cellar with 300 bottles of premium wine. Kids will have fun playing Play Station, and swings are available. They will be able to dive into the depths of the sea and explore the marine world.

neighborhood_overview:
The lighthouse is open for rent all year round, which is why your stay will be equally perfect in all seasons: spring will be a great time for sport fishing, hot summer ideal for fun swimming in the warm sea, while in autumn you will enjoy romantic sunsets and a starry sky. If you do not come with your own boat, you are also offered with a transfer to the lighthouse, and by prior arrangement you can have a person who will be at your disposal 0/24, a chef and a massager. In addition, you will surely be interested in tours to the Kornati, Hvar or Vis.

The islet of Prišnjak consists of a dry stone wall and a few pine trees, which will create comfort and shade from the summer heat. If you want a luxurious refreshment, on the terrace there is a jacuzzi, 7 sun loungers and an outdoor gazebo for enjoyment and relaxation. Some of the interesting legends of the islet of Prišnjak are that in the 1950s, a pregnant lighthouse keeper's wife contracted premature labor. Her husband put her in a boat and rowed towards Murter. However, the sea was stronger than the rower’s strength and the baby was born in a boat. Legend has it that they named him Jadran, and Prišnjak - Murter was written as his place of birth.

We believe that you will experience a wonderful vacation on this extremely special island, enjoy complete hedonism in peace and quiet, relax reading your favorite readings listening only to the sound of the waves.

description:
Welcome to Ollero Eco Lodge – we’re a family-owned environmentally friendly cottage retreat by the Ounasjoki river on the Arctic Circle. You’ve found the perfect base for your holiday in Rovaniemi: Ollero Eco Lodge sleeps 6 people (8 with extra beds) in a quiet location just outside the city. We’re a 10-minute drive from the city center with all its services and attractions, yet free of the fuss and light pollution – a prime spot for observing the Aurora Borealis and arctic nature. Ollero Eco Lodge is an environmentally friendly combination of comfort and rustic Lapland style.

Ollero Eco Lodge is an ideal stay for couples, families and small groups who want to experience Lapland and the peace and quiet of arctic nature in an environmentally friendly way.

A traditional Lapland cottage on the bank of the Ounasjoki river right outside the city of Rovaniemi, Ollero Eco Lodge is composed of three separate buildings (please see below for details).

Enjoy your privacy: when staying here, all three buildings are reserved only for you.

The large yard and nearby forest provide easy access to outdoor fun, whether exploring local nature, sledding or building snowmen tickles your fancy. Want to hunt for the Northern Lights? Just step out the door and you'll find yourself in a prime spot.

There are three toilets in Ollero Eco Lodge, one in the Main Lodge and two additional eco-toilets in the Glass Igloo and the Sleeping Cabin.

Ollero Eco Lodge is located by Ounasvaara river at the end of a private street called Olleronlammentie. It is surrounded by forest and nearest neighbours are 300 meters away up to the street.

Ollero Eco Lodge is located next to a family run reindeer farm called Napapiirin Porofarmi. It takes only 5 -10 min to walk there. Remember to contact them in advance if you are keen on visiting the farm: https://porofarmi.fi/index.php/english

name: Notti di Cimes - La Grande Cabane du Mauret
description:
Arroccata tra due magnifici alberi, la grande capanna Mauret è allo stesso tempo confortevole e rustica. L'accesso è da una scala in legno e poi da due passerelle completamente protette da una rete che conduce direttamente ad una grande terrazza. All'interno molte finestre creano un'atmosfera luminosa e permettono di godere appieno dell'ambiente circostante. E il suo grande vantaggio è la sua seconda terrazza arroccata su una parte del tetto, per vivere appieno questa avventura unica.
È dotato di servizi igienici asciutti, angolo cottura con gas e lavandino, riscaldamento a gas, tavoli e sedie all'interno e sulla terrazza, elettricità solare (lampade).
Questo capanno non ha la doccia. Forniamo asciugamani e guanti per un bagno rustico al lavello della cucina.
La zona giorno ha due divani trasformabili. Al piano superiore c'è una grande stanza sotto i tetti. In tutto, la capanna è pensata per ospitare fino a sette persone in formula hotel, ovvero letti puliti e preparati... non è necessario portare lenzuola e viene fornita la prima colazione.
neighborhood_overview:
Situate nel cuore della foresta, le capanne sono isolate a 1200 m di altitudine presso il Col de l'Arzelier nel Parco Naturale Regionale del Vercors. Una camminata di circa 3/4 h a piedi, in salita, permette di raggiungere una vista mozzafiato a 360° su tutte le catene montuose circostanti: Dévoluy, Vercors, Chartreuse, Beledonne, Monte Bianco ...
Luogo ideale per vedere molti animali, praticare escursioni a piedi, mountain bike, slittino, ciaspolate, scialpinismo ..

name: A High-Alpine Hut in the Mountains
description:
IMPORTANT: The hut is only accessible by vehicle in summer, and you must have AWD or 4WD. IN WINTER THE HUT IS NOT ACCESSIBLE BY VEHICLE; you snowshoe or ski tour the 3 miles and 1400 vertical feet to the hut on the closed 4x4 trail. (Inquire about our snowcat to haul gear.)

Guests must bring their own sleeping bags and pillowcases. Hut shoes/slippers are also nice to have. The hut is "self-clean"; leave it as found or better! The $250 cleaning fee will be fully, partially, or not returned dependent on condition of hut upon your departure.

The main living space is 12'x12' and includes three twin beds that double as seating/couches during the day. There is a woodstove for heat. One of the first things to do upon arrival is get a fire going.

The next thing to do is send someone for water at the nearby Spring, creek or by melting snow in the large water pot on the woodstove. In winter, the Spring is about a 5 minute walk up the road, marked by a bamboo at the trail off the right side of the road just after the neighboring driveway on the left. We provide two large 5 gallon jugs for collecting water, and a sled to help carry the load.

There is a small kitchenette set up with a bucket sink (bucket, as well as ALL water, must be emptied before checking out), propane camp stove, utensils for cooking, silverware, dishware, pots, pans, teapot, french press, strainer, sponges, towels and/or paper towels, etc. It's not a bad idea to bring disposable plates and bowls to minimize dishes.

Upstairs is accessed via an outdoor staircase and is another 12'x12' room with beautiful views and a double-over-double bunk bed. It is heated via the fire downstairs, and stays nice and cozy.

Outside is a large mostly covered deck area. There is an enclosed outhouse-style bathroom with tank-toilet on the deck.
neighborhood_overview: An off-grid hut in the high alpine environment of Grays and Torreys Mountains, notable 14'ers. Beautifully updated, rustic decor without electricity, running water or WiFi - a true peaceful respite! Quiet and remote, surrounded by grand mountains and beautiful scenery. Cozy up by the heat of the wood burning stove or go for a skin or snowshoe. Sleeps 5-7 in beds.

name: Villa Editta in San Casciano in Val di Pesa
description:
It features a private swimming pool, a private patio, a private garden, air conditioning (please read description below to check in which rooms the units are installed), winter heating and WI-FI Internet access.

You will be roughly 8.3 km (5.2 miles) from San Casciano in Val di Pesa, where you will find restaurants, shops and public transportation. You will find the closest restaurant and a grocery store at 2 km (roughly 1.2 miles). You will reach Villa Editta from the parking area without having to climb any steps.

To stay at Villa Editta you will need a car. You will be able to park it free of charge on the premises. Please note that access to Villa Editta is along a 150-meters (492 feets) unpaved road.

The eighteenth-century villa is located within a 14 hectares (23 acres) park planted with vineyards and olive groves. You will be in the heart of the Chianti region, just a few kilometers away from Florence.

Villa Editta features a large swimming pool, a tennis court, a bowling green and a small amphitheatre where weddings could be celebrate (upon request and for a fee).

As guest of Villa Editta you will be able to take part (upon request and for a fee) in many activities, such as, bicycle tours, walking tours, gym with personal training, fitness and stretch classes, yoga, pilates or thai chi classes, cooking school, catering and wine tasting.

Upon request and for a fee, you will also have the opportunity to hire a personal chef, require daily housekeeping, organize airport tranfers.
Swimming Pool

The swimming pool is 6 meters (20 feet) large by 10 meters (33 feet) long, 1.5 meters (5 feet) deep. It can be heated if requested (additional cost applies -- please enquire with our staff). The area is equipped with chairs, deck chairs and sun loungers, and it is partly shaded by tall trees. From the swimming pool you will enjoy a charming view of the greenery. The pool is open from the beginning of March until the end of November.
neighborhood_overview: Villa Editta is a charming three-story villa situated in the heart of the Chianti region, a few kilometers away from Florence. It sleeps 16 people. From Villa Editta you will enjoy a spellbinding view of the greenery and of the hills. Villa Editta is 600 square meters (6460 square feet).
